EmailTemplate.name: 16.CEM.MotiveCDP.none.D.G.N.2315.Email 1 - Success story - Redefining the custom
EmailTemplate.subject: Operator easily manages over 6,000 device models. Read the case study.
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Too many device management platforms? European operator uses the Nokia Motive Connected Device Platform to manage over 6,000 device models and over 40 OS versions The Motive Connected Device Platform is installed in over 300 service providers worldwide to manage mobile, fixed, cable, MVNOs and IoT devices. It is the industry-leading solution and can simplify how you manage the coming tsunami of connected devices. Read how one European operator with the Motive Connected Device Platform has had 23.4% fewer calls to the Help Desk for device settings and a 50% decrease in the number of customers contacting customer care or using self-services. Connect with us © 2016 Nokia.
